Effect: Causes heavy suffocation damage. Becomes even more lethal if the mob has more than 120 suffocation damage.
Causes the affected mob to burst into flames periodically
Threshold: while also giving them small doses of Napalm and Chlorine Trifluoride. If wet when bursting into flames
column10: the victims will also explode. Explosions can happen in stage 4 and stage 5.

Effect: Causes rapid hair loss.
Causes the mob's cells to decay rapidly
Causes spikes of oxygen deprivation. Deals damage based on stage speed and stealth.
Makes the affected mob be confused for short periods of time
Threshold: making them walk in random directions.

Effect: The virus irritates the throat of the host
Threshold: causing occasional coughing. Each cough will try to infect bystanders who are within 1 tile of the host with the virus.

Effect: Causes intermittent loss of hearing.
Causes the host's face to crumble and cave in
Threshold: disfiguring the host to appear as "unknown" to others until cured.

Effect: Shakes the affected mob's screen.
The virus bonds with the DNA of the host
Threshold: activating random dormant mutations within their DNA. When the virus is cured
column10: the host's genetic alterations are undone.

Effect: Makes you never physically older than young adulthood and prevents death by old age. Should be used for buffing your disease.
Makes you grow a massive beard
Heats up your body. Will not reach damaging levels of heat unless resistance thresholds are met.
Makes the affected mob have hallucinations for short periods of time. Available in Virus Crates.
Displays an annoying message! Should be used for buffing your disease.
Inflicts eye damage over time. Causes blindness if left unchecked.
The virus becomes able to affect inorganic species
Threshold: such as Golems or Plasmamen.

Effect: Displays an annoying message. Should be used for buffing your disease. Can do slight brute damage if the stage speed threshold is met.
Doubles the host's metabolism speed
Threshold: making them process chems much faster than normal
column10: but also increasing their hunger tenfold.

Effect: The virus strengthens the bonds between neurons
Threshold: reducing the duration of any ailment of the mind. Heals brain damage
column10: and can cure mild and heavy traumas if upgraded.

Effect: The virus reacts to nanites in the host's bloodstream by enhancing their replication cycle.
Makes the host drowsy and prone to falling asleep randomly.
The virus becomes able to affect corpses and undead races
Causes brute damage over time. Fatal if left untreated.
Heals brute and burn damage if the host is not currently exposed to light. Heals brute damage more quickly than burn damage.
The host absorbs plasma in the air and in their bloodstream
Threshold: using it to stabilize their temperature and heal brute

Effect: The virus replaces the melanin in the skin with reactive pigment
Threshold: by adding random crayon powder to the host.

Effect: Heals brute
column10: and toxin damage while the host is irradiated. Higher radiation levels increase the healing speed.

Effect: Causes the host to fall into a death-like coma when heavily damaged
Quickly heals oxygen damage
Restores mob's senses by fixing eye and ear damage and curing hallucinations.
Cools down your body. Won't reach damaging levels unless thresholds are met.
The virus reacts to nanites in the host's bloodstream by attacking and consuming them.
The virus causes irritation of the nasal cavity
Threshold: making the host sneeze occasionally. Sneezes from this symptom will spread the virus in a 4 meter cone in front of the host.

Effect: Sets your body on fire periodically.
Heals brute
column10: and toxin damage while exposed to starlight. Heals toxin more efficiently. Actually being in space intensifies the effect.

Effect: Heals brute and burn damage if the host drank water recently
Threshold: or if they're wet. Heals burn damage more efficiently.

Effect: Purges all chemicals at a fast rate from the bloodstream.
Massively buffs the evolutionary cycle of viruses
Threshold: causing it to be faster acting
column11: but more easily detected and cured.

Effect: Massively buffs the adaptation of viruses
column10: harder to cure but slower acting.

Effect: Changes the voice of the affected mob. Causing confusion in communication. Available in Virus Crates.
Forces the affected mob to vomit! Makes the affected mob lose nutrition and heal toxin damage.
The virus mutates the host's metabolism
Threshold: making it almost unable to gain nutrition from food.
